name: Locust on Heroku with Private Spaces
description: This app is the sample of Locust which is the popular powerful stress tool.

URI1.description: The URI is a target URI on HOSTNAME

MIN_WAIT.description: This is the minimum time respectively, in milliseconds, that a simulated user will wait between MIN_WAIT and MAX_WAIT executing each task

MAX_WAIT.description: This is the maximum time respectively, in milliseconds, that a simulated user will wait between MIN_WAIT and MAX_WAIT executing each task.
